title: Tumacácori National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets on a leash are welcome along the Anza Trail all year-round.  Download and print a map of the Anza Trail between Tumacácori and Tubac (.pdf, 306k)   In compliance with the Code of Federal Regulations and Superintendent's Compendium, Tumacácori prohibits pets from all government buildings and the mission grounds. For more information and the origin of this policy, please visit the page on Management.   Never endanger an animal by leaving it unattended in a vehicle or tied up outside.
